select count(1) from c_configuration where name = 'Add-More-Stages-To-A-Loan-Life-Cycle';

column.name: description
column.value: This configuration adds more stages to a loan life cycle if enabled. Extra stages are Application Review,Due Diligence,Collateral review, IC Review etc
